text: @holly_cummins Awesome talk that you gave at Adyen today. Besides the great story, I loved your use of visuals to deliver the message. Was wondering what’s your workflow to create a talk like this one of today

author.name: Tarek Amr 🎲
author.description: Machine Learning Engineer at @Adyen. Previously seen at @TicketSwap @Catawiki @uniofeastanglia - I read, write and code. 🇪🇬🇳🇱🇪🇺🏴‍☠️
